title: La Gazzetta dello Sport 1952 nameplate
content:
Hi all - can anyone suggest a close match to the attached masthead. Looks like it was hand drawn but I'm sure I've seeing something similar. Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gazzetta\_dello\_sport29-07-1952.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121109061059/http:/typophile.com/files/gazzetta_dello_sport29-07-1952.jpg) | 188.55 KB |
author: ult

comments.content:
If I'm not mistaken the date on the newspaper looks like 1952. That makes metal, or maybe film, the only alternative to hand-drawn. It also makes finding it pretty hard, because Italian type is not well documented in most font books I have access to.

- Mike Yanega
